name: Makeup Market
description: This project was made to practice consuming data from an open RESTful API, problem solving, and web design. I used React to build the front-end, axios for the HTTP request, and TailwindCSS to style.

name: Array Generator
description: This project was made to quickly and easily make and format arrays. At the time of making it, it had been a while since I worked with vanulla JavaScript, so it took determination and lots of research to remember how to make it come together. I also practiced problem solving to make the logic work.

name: Youtube Chrome Extension
description: I realized that I did not have to keep pressing skip myself because I engineer software one day, so I decided to jump into the world of creatibg chrome extensions using an outdated youtube tutorial and the google chrome extensions forums. I learned that day that I am really good at learning on the spot, and how important reading docs are.

name: Ugly Thingz
description: With this project I practiced styling with CSS, and using an API to read, create, delete, and update data. I also realized that people will delete all of your data if they are given the opportunity, so it's wise to prepare for that. I also successfully deployed a React project to github-pages, which has proven to be a notable feat.
